item.description:
Health Care Refrom 1O1: How will it impact your Business?

The City of Boston and sponsors will be hosting this great informational session free.

Health care reform changes the way you do business, whether you're a sole proprietor, a family store, or a growing enterprise with dozens of employees. Associated Inustries and Massachusetts has helped thousands of companies understand the new health care reform rules. Join us for a MORNING session of straight talk about what it means for benefits, taxes, and your bottom line!

TIME: 8am - 11:3Oam

When: Wed, Mar 19th

Suffolk University Law School, 12O Tremont Street, 1st floor

Refreshments Provided
item.name: Health Care Reform 1O1. How Will It Impact Your Business?
